name: Ribbit (DamianDevz)
description:
Note: due to time limitation(pun intended), this game was made in 6 hours.

The river is fast and strong. At the end of the river there is a waterfall. Jump from lotus to lotus to avoid falling down the waterfall. Limitation implementation: -You can only stay on each lotus limited amount of time -The more time you spend in the air, the more points you get. Aim with the mouse in the direction you want to jump. The further the mouse is from the frog, the bigger the jump is. Aim precisely to land on the lotuses, otherwise you will drown. Each second you are in the air, you gain a point. Try to get as many points as possible.
